# 单向链表

  1. 链表结构实现
  2. 增删改查
  3. 倒序打印
  4. 倒数第K个节点
  5. 反转链表
  6. 合并有序链表
class HeroNode {
    constructor(no,name,nickName, next) {
        this.no = no
        this.name = name
        this.nickName = nickName
        this.next = next
    }
}

class SingleLinedList {
    constructor() {
        this.head = new HeroNode(0, "", "")
    }
    getHead() {
        return this.head
    }
    // 不考虑编号顺序，直接添加到链表最后
    add(node) {
        let temp = this.head
        while(temp.next) {
            temp = temp.next
        }
        temp.next = node
    }
    // 按顺序添加
    addByOrder(node) {
        let temp = this.head
        // 找添加位置的前一个节点
        let existed = false // 标志添加的编号是否存在
        while (temp.next) {
            if (temp.next.no > node.no) { // 添加到temp 和temp.next之间
                break
            } else if (temp.next.no === node.no) {
                existed = true
                break
            }
            temp = temp.next
        }
        if (existed) {
            console.log(node.no + '已存在')
            return
        }
        node.next = temp.next
        temp.next = node
    }
    // 修改节点信息，根据node.no 修改，
    update(node) {
        if (!this.head.next) {
            console.log('链表为空')
            return
        }
        let temp = this.head.next
        let existed = false
        while (temp) {
            if (temp.no === node.no) {
                existed = true
                break
            }
            temp = temp.next
        }
        if (existed) {
            temp.name = node.name
            temp.nickName = node.nickName
        } else {
            console.log('没有找到' + node.no)
        }
    }
    remove(no) {
        if (!this.head.next) {
            console.log('链表为空')
            return
        }
        let temp = this.head
        let existed = false
        while (temp) {
            if (temp.next === null) {
                break
            }
            if (temp.next.no === no) {
                existed = true
                break
            }
            temp = temp.next
        }
        if (existed) {
            temp.next = temp.next.next
        } else {
            console.log('没有找到要删除的节点 ' + no)
        }
        //
        // let pre = temp
        // while (temp) {
        //     if (temp.no === no) {
        //         existed = true
        //         break
        //     }
        //     pre = temp
        //     temp = temp.next
        // }
        // if (existed) {
        //     pre.next = temp.next
        // }
    }
    show() {
        if (!this.head.next) {
            console.log('链表为空')
            return
        }
        let temp = this.head
        while (temp) {
            console.log(temp)
            temp = temp.next
        }
    }
    // 有效节点个数
    getLength(head) {
        if (!head || !head.next) return 0
        let temp = head.next
        let count = 0
        while (temp) {
            count++
            temp = temp.next
        }
        return count
    }
    // 获取单链表中倒数第 k 个节点
    lastKNode(head, k) {
        let len = this.getLength(head)
        if (k <= 0 || k > len) {
            console.log('超过链表长度~')
            return null
        }
        if (!head.next) return null
        let slow = head.next,fast = head.next
        for (let i = 0; i < k; i++) {
            fast = fast.next
        }
        console.log(fast)
        while (fast != null) {
            slow = slow.next
            fast = fast.next
        }
        return slow
    }

    // 反转单项链表
    reverse(head) {
        if (!head.next || !head.next.next) return
        let dummyNode = new HeroNode(-1, '', '')
        let cur = head.next
        let next = null
        while (cur) {
            next = cur.next // 保存当前节点的下一个节点
            // 当前节点的下一个节点 指向 虚拟节点的下一个节点，第一次时， dummyNode.next = null，相当于把原来的第一个节点移动到最后
            // 反过来就是将cur的下一个节点，指向新链表的最前面， 后面的节点往前放
            cur.next = dummyNode.next
            dummyNode.next = cur // 虚拟节点的下一个节点，指向当前节点，
            cur = next // 当前节点指向 当前节点的下一个节点
        }
        head.next = dummyNode.next // 恢复head
        return head
    }
    // 链表从后往前打印
    // 递归i，利用函数栈
    backward1(head) {
        if (!head || !head.next) return
        this.backward1(head.next)
        console.log(head.next.no)
    }
    // 自己构建栈
    backward2(head) {
        if (!head.next) return
        let stack = []
        let cur = head.next
        while (cur != null) {
            stack.push(cur)
            cur = cur.next
        }
        while (stack.length > 0) {
            console.log(stack.pop())
        }
    }
}
let singleLinkedList = new SingleLinedList()
let node1 = new HeroNode(1,'王二', '隔壁老王')
let node2 = new HeroNode(2,'张三', '法外狂徒')
let node3 = new HeroNode(3,'赵四', '亚洲舞王')

singleLinkedList.addByOrder(node1)
singleLinkedList.addByOrder(node3)
singleLinkedList.addByOrder(node2)

let linedList2 = new SingleLinedList()
let node4 = new HeroNode(4,'王二', '隔壁老王')
let node5 = new HeroNode(5,'张三', '法外狂徒')
let node6 = new HeroNode(6,'赵四', '亚洲舞王')


// linedList2.addByOrder(node4)
linedList2.addByOrder(node5)
linedList2.addByOrder(node6)

// 合并两个有序链表,合并之后依然有序
function mergeLinkedList(linked1, linked2) {
    if (!linked1.head.next) return  linked2
    if (!linked2.head.next) return linked1
    let dummyNode = new HeroNode(-1, '', '')
    let p1 = linked1.head.next
    let p2 = linked2.head.next
    let cur = dummyNode
    while (p1 && p2) {
        if (p1.no < p2.no) {
            cur.next = p1
            p1 = p1.next
        } else {
            cur.next = p2
            p2 = p2.next
        }
        cur = cur.next
    }
    while (p1) {
        cur.next = p1
        cur = p1
        p1 = p1.next
    }
    while (p2) {
        cur.next = p2
        cur = p2
        p2 = p2.next
    }
    return dummyNode
}


// singleLinkedList.remove(1)

// let lastKNode = singleLinkedList.lastKNode(head, 0)
// console.log(singleLinkedList.reverse(head))
// console.dir(singleLinkedList)
// singleLinkedList.backward2(head)
console.log(singleLinkedList)

console.log(mergeLinkedList(singleLinkedList, linedList2))
